title: Side Chairs, 18th century
description:
Simple cabriole legs ending in club feet; tall back rounded at top; seat and back upholstered in tapestry of red ground decorated with scrollwork and vase of flowers in cartouch in tones of cream, tan, ochre and green.  Chairs -1a, -1b and -1d with fitted covers of green fabric.
1a- Needle point of large bouquet of flowers on seat
1b- Needle point of bird on seat
1c- Needle point of small bouquet of flowers on seat
1d- Needle point of small bouquet of flowers on seat

tombstone.epitaph:
Side Chairs, 18th century.
18th century. wood, tapestry upholstery, fabric. Bequest of George D. Widener. 1972-18-1-b,d.
